description: Welcome to OLIVIA in Grandview South Surrey! This GORGEOUS 4 bed/4 bath modern townhouse welcomes an infusion of sunlight in every corner w it's beautiful N/S exposure. Main floor feat. a spacious, unique open floorplan w thoughtfully hidden half bath, walk in pantry, & stunning kitchen w gas range stove, s/s appliances, & quartz counters. Up you'll find the large primary bed w vaulted ceilings, walk-in closet, & a beautiful spa-like ensuite w separate toilet room, as well as 2 more bright beds & separate laundry. Down has a massive 4th bed/flex space w separate entry & full ensuite. BONUS UPGRADES: engineered hardwood, A/C, central vac, bar fridge, alarm system, built in speakers on main, crown molding, & finished DOUBLE GARAGE! AN IMMACULATE 10/10 HOME in GREAT area! This is a MUST SEE!
